casebody.data:
Melissa CHANG
v.
David CHANG Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 5, 2017

Kenneth J. Bartschi and Karen L. Dowd, in support of the petition.

Gary I. Cohen and Yakov Pyetranker, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn. App. 822, 155 A.3d 1272 (2017), is denied.
